A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Least favorite of all the Star Wars movies.....The good ...Last 40 minutes was epic!....Great Action and a few surprises! The Bad: The story as a whole was badly organized.  New characters were not memorable or original.  The Frustrating: They took the easy way out and gave us no back story on the two biggest mysteries from the first movie....who is Supreme Leader Snoke? Who is Rey's parents? I can not believe they are giving Rian Johnson his own Trilogy.  Wow after the negative User reviews that is a grave mistake! It will be the first Star Wars movie that I won't go to the Theater to watch....Very disappointed!
